miniapp.name: FlashDrill
miniapp.subtitle: Tiny flashcards you can clear in a minute.
miniapp.description: FlashDrill is a micro flashcard trainer: flip, mark again or got it, and keep a simple streak of what you’ve learned.
miniapp.tagline: Tiny flashcards you can clear in a minute.
miniapp.ogDescription: FlashDrill is a micro flashcard trainer: flip, mark again or got it, and keep a simple streak of what you’ve learned.
